text: Michel Lezeau (born December 20, 1942 in Orléans) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Indre-et-Loire department, and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement.http://www.assemblee- nationale.fr/13/tribun/fiches_id/267283.asp ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:People from Orléans Category:Politicians from Centre-Val de Loire Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Michel Lezeau
